review_text:
WOW! This cabin retreat is truly a hidden gem, tucked away in the bend of the creek. I spent a long weekend there, just myself and my 7 year old. The cabin itself is roomy and just like home. The beds are extremely comfortable! While we came for the great outdoors, it was nice to have a TV in each room to be able to put on while we were cooking and relaxing. The kitchen is complete with pots and pans and baking sheets, and the fridge/freezer has plenty of room. I was right at home in the cabin.
We spent our days down by the creek, which is easily assessable by a well-worn path and stepping stones. We are able to pull our soccer wagon down to the creek with our chairs, snacks and beach toys. While the creek wasn't quite deep enough on this visit to kayak, we had a blast on the inner tubes, creating our own fast-moving "lazy river"! Once we tired of that, we tied off to a tree and just floated, gazing at the cloudless sky. The trees surrounding the beach provide the right amount of shade to allow you to spend the entire day out on the water and its sandy shore. We did go for several hikes in the woods, spotting rabbits and squirrels. We saw raccoon footprints by the water, but the elusive creature itself was not spotted. We had fun finding the tracks in the sand and looking them up to see what animal made them.
For our visit, we also had use of the hot tub. That was enjoyable for my son, who had never experienced that! For this old mom, it was a great way to relax in the evening!
I would also be remiss if I did not mention the deck around the cabin. I spent the early mornings, wrapped in a blanket in the hammock, enjoying my coffee and the sounds of the woods waking up around me. So very peaceful.
It is also worth noting that the Wifi in the cabin is very strong. We were able to stay connected, even down by the water. With my job, I needed to be able to access Internet the entire time. I'm happy to say remote work is possible in this cabin and on the beach!
Thank you to Melissa and her family for sharing this space with the AirBnB community.

review_text: This property is a gem. Beautiful house, beautiful property on the lake. The neighborhood is very peaceful. There was plenty of room for our family of 4. It was well stocked with many thoughtful touches throughout to make it feel like home. We did not cook, but we did use the plates, glasses and silverware from the well stocked cabinets. The beds were comfortable. Even though it was a little chilly during our visit, our college-aged kids had a great time exploring the lake on the kayak and paddle board. Brian had excellent communication and was prompt with responses and clear directions. We would definitely stay here again the next time we visit the area!
